text: Using a whisk, mix the black pepper, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper flakes and vinegar in a mixing bowl.  Transfer the tortellini to a pan to cook.  Drain the pasta using a colander, then place it in a huge mixing bowl. Combine with the other ingredients, and stir until completely combined. Transfer the salad to your refrigerator to chill. Once the salad has chilled, blanch it, see how the seasoning tastes, and use salt and pepper to alter it. Finished.
